section.name: Magnolia News List
section.p: If you want to stay informed about Magnolia, please subscribe to our magnolia newsletter (simply send an empty email). You can cancel at any time.
This is a very low volume list. We will only post Magnolia relevant news to this list, so that you will stay up-to-date regarding the major developments concerning Magnolia.
You might also be interested in the archive.

You can unsubscribe at any time by sending an empty email to news-list-off@magnolia.info
To switch to the DIGEST mode, send an empty email to news-list-digest@magnolia.info
To switch to the INDEX mode, send an empty email to news-list-index@magnolia.info
For any administrative enquieries, please use news-list-request@magnolia.info
